title: Share
noShareDisclaimer: You have insufficient permissions to change the share level.
sharingLimitedItemDisclaimer: Share level options are limited on certain item types.
sharingLimitedDisclaimer: Some share level options are limited by your sharing privileges.
cannotShareToLevelDisclaimer: You don't have the privilege to set items to this share level.

shareLevel.title: Set sharing level
shareLevel.noPermission: You have insufficient permissions to change the share level.

private.title: Owner
private.description: Owner of the item(s) has access

org.title: Organization
org.description: All members of your organization have access

public.title: Everyone (public)
public.description: People outside your organization have access

shareGroup.title: Set group sharing
shareGroup.noGroup: You don't have any groups to share to yet.

publicAccountOpenGroupBrowser.title: Change share level for items
publicAccountOpenGroupBrowser.description: Items owned by a Public Account must be shared to Everyone before sharing to a group. Update share levels to Everyone and go to Group Sharing?

publicAccountSetShareToPrivate.title: Set item share level to Private
publicAccountSetShareToPrivate.description: Items owned by a Public Account cannot be shared to a group if they are private. Remove group sharing?

publicAccountRevertShareLevel.title: Revert item share level
publicAccountRevertShareLevel.description: Items owned by a Public Account cannot be shared to a group if they are private. Remove group sharing?

publicAccountRevertGroup.title: Revert group sharing
publicAccountRevertGroup.description: Items owned by a Public Account cannot be shared to a group if they are private. Set item share level to Public?

publicDataCollectionEnabled.title: Warning: Sharing editable layer publicly
publicDataCollectionEnabled.description: You are making your editable layer public. For optimal performance and data integrity, please consider disabling editing or using a non-editable view layer.

publicDataCollectionDisabled.title: Unable to share editable layer publicly
publicDataCollectionDisabled.description: To share publicly, first turn on the Public Data Collection option on the Settings tab of the layer's item page then share again. For optimal performance and data integrity, please consider disabling editing or using a non-editable view layer.
